longBusinessSummary: Food & Life Companies Ltd. operates a chain of Sushi restaurants. It operates restaurants under Sugidama, Kyotaru, Kaisen-Misakiko, and Sushiro brands. The company was formerly known as Sushiro Global Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Food & Life Companies Ltd. in April 2021. Food & Life Companies Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Suita, Japan.
